column5: Does anyone know when the a bait store opens in WAWA? I need to buy some leaches and was wondering when they open and if there is a place to get some.ThanksJohn

I just confirmed that Youngs General Store is open 7am to 10pm 7 days a week, they got all types of bait, tackle,and maps too and are Esso gas station, can't miss them on your right as you come into town , big old fire engine and other antiques in front.
ThanksWe should be there around 7:00am to 7:30am. The airplane is scheduled for 8:30am. I have never been out on time!!!!!John

Ketchenennyyou don't give up do you, good trait for an angler!As for hotspots I am not happy lately on only small walleye coming out of Whitefish Lake. I hear there is a combination Salmon Walleye Derby in Wawa area at end of the month, We will see what local lake gets the big ones bitingExtreme drought past 5 weeks slowed down walleye evening fishing but last night Algoma region got tons of rain so perhaps finally the bigones will come on bite. I have a week off to try day and night now.

Just thought I would try one more time. Hope the bite improves for you. Rain & cool weather should help. Down here on Lake St. Clair the walleye are going crazy in numbers and size. Just had to slow down to a drift and a plain nightcrawler on a 4 inch drop is doing the trick for me right now. You might want to try the same.Tight lines and hope see you next June.
